comments.body: I'd recommend moving all these client-go & prometheus related adapters to a single directory, like pkg/client/metrics. Doing that in a follow-up is ok.
I agree this should be done but I would like to do that in a separate PR.
I was thinking of moving them under pkg/util/prometheusclientgo as per leaderelection.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +22,26 @@	_ "k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/util/prometheusclientgo/leaderelection" // for leader election metric registration
	_ "k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/util/reflector/prometheus"              // for reflector metric registration
	_ "k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/util/workqueue/prometheus"              // for workqueue metric registration
)

comments.body: Explain here that this package should be used in your application when using both client-go and prometheus in your app.
